extendedInfo.description: Fight your way through hordes of enemies, upgrade your weapons, defeat the bosses and submit your results to the Scoreloop network!"A very high quality game, 5/5 stars" - meandmydroid.com"Awesome!â - droidandroidgames.comOverkill is simply the best side-scrolling shooter you can get for your Android phone. Features:* Hordes of enemies, upgradeable weapons, thrilling gameplay* 10 campaign levels + 10 bonus levels + 4 stages in "Survival" mode* Superior graphics, top quality sound* Online leaderboards (Scorepoop)* Zeemote bluetooth controller support* Full support of tablets* App2sd---IMPORTANT: For the best experience, try different control options. Default tilt controls may not work well on some devices, so be sure to try trackball/keyboard/dpad too!keywords: side-scrolling space shooter, shoot'em upsimilar: Radiant, Sky Force, Space War

reviews.title: Perfect game.
reviews.comment: The game is perfect in every aspect .some more weaponary can be added to make it more interesting.Gameplay is very thrilling controls are also adjustable.
reviews.author: Alessandro J

reviews.title: Galaxy s3 4.1.2 android
reviews.comment: Game crashes before gameplay . Shame.... seems very few games for zeemote now one less :(
reviews.author: Ross Anderson

reviews.title: Freakin amazing!
reviews.comment: Awesome game, left a great impression. Just needs more to do. Additional stages and weapon upgrades would make this perfect. Also the tilt controls are spot on and keep the game fluid. Would\'ve gladly paid for this if it came with more content.
reviews.author: Michael Seymour

reviews.title: Won\'t load on my Galaxy S3!
reviews.comment: Zero stars. Downloaded it twice with same effect. Crashes right after it tells me how many wonderful control options it has. Poop. I am going to Alaska for 3 months to the middle of nowhere and really wanted to have it to play!
reviews.author: Jainon MacCollis

reviews.title: Overkill: Space Shooter contains malware:
reviews.comment: I purchased the game some time ago for 1,99 \342\202\254, now I updated the app, found out that it\'s now for free and also found out that it now contains the malware: Android.Trojan.BaseBridge.S (scanned with GData Mobile Security 2) The developer doesn\'t answer my email...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Dev please fix constant heavy fire when using zeemote then 5 stars, good game
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: An Android Gingerbread User
reviews.comment: just downloaded this for my Alcatel 903 android phone its a good game good graphics and sound too. controls are good too ( if you use your phone to tilt the ship up and down)  well worth installing :-)
reviews.author: BILL ENNIS

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: This Overkill game reminds me of the old gradius days. Its realy fun, Kind of challenging, and has just enough weapon settings to make the ship your own. I give it 5 stars because, for me it has replay value .     Having beaten the game  Iam looking forward to the updates.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t run on Samsung note
reviews.comment: Looks like a decent game on videos etc but goes straight to black screen and \"overkill has stopped\" whenever a level launches.
reviews.author: Nic Guthrie

reviews.title: Crashes htc inspire 4g
reviews.comment: Fully updated htc inspire 4g 32g sim card, great game but level 3 crashes. Does it at random times during the level. Will rate 5/5 when fixed
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent on my phone.
reviews.comment: My tablet is very hard to control though. Accelerometer control is set for portrait but game plays in landscape, touch controls are a bit laggy and your hand gets in the way, there really needs to be a configuration option to rotate the accelerometer input to match your screen.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So much fun!
reviews.comment: And runs basically constant at 60fps on my Samsung Galaxy S. Loads of fun! Classic feel to it.  Thanks devs!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Exciting shoot-em-up requiring tactics and reflexes. Runs well on 600mhz. Negatives: too short, occasional accel glitch and the AI dialogue is stoopid
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Get it.
reviews.comment: Sweet as. Play it using your accelerometer, it works really well.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game but...
reviews.comment: I love the game play just wished the devs would put out more content for it.
reviews.author: Patrick Hutcheson

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Always force-closes on game start using Nexus 10. Boourns!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Fun game, until you hit \' back\' too many times and it exits...granted, it warns you after the first press, but in the heat of the game...annoying!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: WTF!!!
reviews.comment: It told me that I don\'t have the license to play this game, but I purchased it from Android Market (Play Store).
reviews.author: Chris Gaffy

reviews.title: Good but need more lvs
reviews.comment: Needs update for new levels
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Exited...but..
reviews.comment: Force close on galaxy s3. Same result after reducing video settings
reviews.author: A Google User
